The unknowing might think them rich because of their self-restraint, but you will recognize them by their characteristic of not begging persistently. The disbelievers will be fuel for the Fire","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b2dca4c8-3caf-414f-a1a7-7cbf331267cb","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"غني","wordgroup_id":"96284a4b-0b3b-4f63-b7c2-b8ef62ddf35d"},{"id":105532,"root":"غني","root_slug":"Gny","surah":3,"verse":97,"word_index":23,"arabic_text":"فِيهِ آيَاتٌ بَيِّنَاتٌ مَّقَامُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمَن دَخَلَهُ كَانَ آمِنًا وَلِلَّهِ عَلَى النَّاسِ حِجُّ الْبَيْتِ مَنِ اسْتَطَاعَ إِلَيْهِ سَبِيلًا وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنِ الْعَالَمِينَ","translation_text":"there are clear signs in it; it is the place where Abraham stood to pray; whoever enters it is safe. Pilgrimage to the House is a duty owed to God by people who are able to undertake it. Those who reject this &#91;should know that&#93; God has no need of anyone","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b2dca4c8-3caf-414f-a1a7-7cbf331267cb","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"غني","wordgroup_id":"96284a4b-0b3b-4f63-b7c2-b8ef62ddf35d"},{"id":105738,"root":"غني","root_slug":"Gny","surah":3,"verse":116,"word_index":5,"arabic_text":"إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَن تُغْنِيَ عَنْهُمْ أَمْوَالُهُمْ وَلَا أَوْلَادُهُم مِّنَ اللَّهِ شَيْئًا وَأُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ","translation_text":"As for those who disbelieve, neither their possessions nor their children will help them against God- they will be companions in the Fire, there to remain","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b2dca4c8-3caf-414f-a1a7-7cbf331267cb","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"غني","wordgroup_id":"96284a4b-0b3b-4f63-b7c2-b8ef62ddf35d"},{"id":106505,"root":"غني","root_slug":"Gny","surah":3,"verse":181,"word_index":11,"arabic_text":"لَّقَدْ سَمِعَ اللَّهُ قَوْلَ الَّذِينَ قَالُوا إِنَّ اللَّهَ فَقِيرٌ وَنَحْنُ أَغْنِيَاءُ سَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَالُوا وَقَتْلَهُمُ الْأَنبِيَاءَ بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّ وَنَقُولُ ذُوقُوا عَذَابَ الْحَرِيقِ","translation_text":"God has certainly heard the words of those who sneer, &lsquo;So God is poor, while we are rich&rsquo;. Do not consume it hastily before they come of age: if the guardian is well off he should abstain from the orphan&rsquo;s property, and if he is poor he should use only what is fair. When you give them their property, call witnesses in; but God takes full account of everything you do","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b2dca4c8-3caf-414f-a1a7-7cbf331267cb","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"غني","wordgroup_id":"96284a4b-0b3b-4f63-b7c2-b8ef62ddf35d"},{"id":108635,"root":"غني","root_slug":"Gny","surah":4,"verse":130,"word_index":3,"arabic_text":"وَإِن يَتَفَرَّقَا يُغْنِ اللَّهُ كُلًّا مِّن سَعَتِهِ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ وَاسِعًا حَكِيمًا","translation_text":"but if husband and wife do separate, God will provide for each out of His plenty: He is infinite in plenty, and all wise","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b2dca4c8-3caf-414f-a1a7-7cbf331267cb","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"غني","wordgroup_id":"96284a4b-0b3b-4f63-b7c2-b8ef62ddf35d"}]}}]}]
67:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ68:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of cannot bear to eat only one kind of food, so pray to your Lord to bring out for us some of the earth&rsquo;s produce, its herbs and cucumbers, its garlic, lentils, and onions.&rsquo; He said, &lsquo;Would you exchange better for worse? Go to Egypt and there you will find what you have asked for.&rsquo; They were struck with humiliation and wretchedness, and they incurred the wrath of God because they persistently rejected His messages and killed prophets contrary to all that is right. They have drawn God&rsquo;s wrath upon themselves. They are overshadowed by weakness, too, because they have persistently disbelieved in God&rsquo;s revelation and killed prophets without any right, all because of their disobedience and boundless transgression","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"6213758f-e29b-4094-84c1-92d90fec25fb","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عصي","wordgroup_id":"ce5adbce-eda9-4d5e-8a2d-851ab2a8aa93"},{"id":106110,"root":"عصي","root_slug":"ESy","surah":3,"verse":152,"word_index":14,"arabic_text":"وَلَقَدْ صَدَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ وَعْدَهُ إِذْ تَحُسُّونَهُم بِإِذْنِهِ حَتَّىٰ إِذَا فَشِلْتُمْ وَتَنَازَعْتُمْ فِي الْأَمْرِ وَعَصَيْتُم مِّن بَعْدِ مَا أَرَاكُم مَّا تُحِبُّونَ مِنكُم مَّن يُرِيدُ الدُّنْيَا وَمِنكُم مَّن يُرِيدُ الْآخِرَةَ ثُمَّ صَرَفَكُمْ عَنْهُمْ لِيَبْتَلِيَكُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَفَا عَنكُمْ وَاللَّهُ ذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ","translation_text":"God fulfilled His promise to you: you were routing them, with His permission, but then you faltered, disputed the order, and disobeyed, once He had brought you within sight of your goal- some of you desire the gains of this world and others desire the world to come- and then He prevented you from &#91;defeating&#93; them as a punishment. فَانكِحُوهُنَّ بِإِذْنِ أَهْلِهِنَّ وَآتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ مُحْصَنَاتٍ غَيْرَ مُسَافِحَاتٍ وَلَا مُتَّخِذَاتِ أَخْدَانٍ فَإِذَا أُحْصِنَّ فَإِنْ أَتَيْنَ بِفَاحِشَةٍ فَعَلَيْهِنَّ نِصْفُ مَا عَلَى الْمُحْصَنَاتِ مِنَ الْعَذَابِ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ الْعَنَتَ مِنكُمْ وَأَن تَصْبِرُوا خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ","translation_text":"If any of you does not have the means to marry a believing free woman, then marry a believing slave- God knows best &#91;the depth of&#93; your faith: you are &#91;all&#93; part of the same family- so marry them with their people&rsquo;s consent and their proper bride-gifts. &#91;Make them&#93; married women, not adulteresses or lovers. If they commit adultery when they are married, their punishment will be half that of free women. This is for those of you who fear that you will sin; it is better for you to practise selfrestraint. God is most forgiving and merciful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"3b61a728-a995-4ab4-a78a-92b2f9d12e11","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"طوع","wordgroup_id":"bf611206-e7d1-4b4f-adad-46632999c92b"},{"id":107320,"root":"طوع","root_slug":"TwE","surah":4,"verse":34,"word_index":31,"arabic_text":"الرِّجَالُ قَوَّامُونَ عَلَى النِّسَاءِ بِمَا فَضَّلَ اللَّهُ بَعْضَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ وَبِمَا أَنفَقُوا مِنْ أَمْوَالِهِمْ فَالصَّالِحَاتُ قَانِتَاتٌ حَافِظَاتٌ لِّلْغَيْبِ بِمَا حَفِظَ اللَّهُ وَاللَّاتِي تَخَافُونَ نُشُوزَهُنَّ فَعِظُوهُنَّ وَاهْجُرُوهُنَّ فِي الْمَضَاجِعِ وَاضْرِبُوهُنَّ فَإِنْ أَطَعْنَكُمْ فَلَا تَبْغُوا عَلَيْهِنَّ سَبِيلًا إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيًّا كَبِيرًا","translation_text":"Husbands should take good care of their wives, with &#91;the bounties&#93; God has given to some more than others and with what they spend out of their own money. Righteous wives are devout and guard what God would have them guard in their husbands&rsquo; absence. If you fear high-handedness from your wives, remind them &#91;of the teachings of God&#93;, then ignore them when you go to bed, then hit them.If they obey you, you have no right to act against them: God is most high and great","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"3b61a728-a995-4ab4-a78a-92b2f9d12e11","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"طوع","wordgroup_id":"bf611206-e7d1-4b4f-adad-46632999c92b"},{"id":107497,"root":"طوع","root_slug":"TwE","surah":4,"verse":46,"word_index":24,"arabic_text":"مِّنَ الَّذِينَ هَادُوا يُحَرِّفُونَ الْكَلِمَ عَن مَّوَاضِعِهِ وَيَقُولُونَ سَمِعْنَا وَعَصَيْنَا وَاسْمَعْ غَيْرَ مُسْمَعٍ وَرَاعِنَا لَيًّا بِأَلْسِنَتِهِمْ وَطَعْنًا فِي الدِّينِ وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا وَاسْمَعْ وَانظُرْنَا لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ وَأَقْوَمَ وَلَـٰكِن لَّعَنَهُمُ اللَّهُ بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَلَا يُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا","translation_text":"Some Jews distort the meaning of &#91;revealed&#93; words: they say, &lsquo;We hear and disobey,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Listen,&rsquo; &#91;adding the insult&#93; &lsquo;May you not hear,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Raina &#91;Look at us&#93;,&rsquo; twisting it abusively with their tongues so as to disparage religion. If they had said, &lsquo;We hear and obey,&rsquo; &lsquo;Listen,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Unzurna &#91;Look at us&#93;,&rsquo; that would have been better and more proper for them. But God has spurned them for their defiance; they believe very little","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"3b61a728-a995-4ab4-a78a-92b2f9d12e11","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"طوع","wordgroup_id":"bf611206-e7d1-4b4f-adad-46632999c92b"}]}}]}]

Be mindful of God, and remember that you will be gathered to Him","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"39bd0e84-0e9e-4285-abf1-a2022d131f37","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ذكر","wordgroup_id":"1268943c-3e83-40b9-87f3-701e7994bd02"},{"id":103254,"root":"ذكر","root_slug":"Ckr","surah":2,"verse":221,"word_index":39,"arabic_text":"وَلَا تَنكِحُوا الْمُشْرِكَاتِ حَتَّىٰ يُؤْمِنَّ وَلَأَمَةٌ مُّؤْمِنَةٌ خَيْرٌ مِّن مُّشْرِكَةٍ وَلَوْ أَعْجَبَتْكُمْ وَلَا تُنكِحُوا الْمُشْرِكِينَ حَتَّىٰ يُؤْمِنُوا وَلَعَبْدٌ مُّؤْمِنٌ خَيْرٌ مِّن مُّشْرِكٍ وَلَوْ أَعْجَبَكُمْ أُولَـٰئِكَ يَدْعُونَ إِلَى النَّارِ وَاللَّهُ يَدْعُو إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ وَالْمَغْفِرَةِ بِإِذْنِهِ وَيُبَيِّنُ آيَاتِهِ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ","translation_text":"Do not marry idolatresses until they believe: a believing slave woman is certainly better than an idolatress, even though she may please you. And do not give your women in marriage to idolaters until they believe: a believing slave is certainly better than an idolater, even though he may please you. Such people call &#91;you&#93; to the Fire, while God calls &#91;you&#93; to the Garden and forgiveness by His leave. He makes His messages clear to people, so that they may bear them in mind","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"39bd0e84-0e9e-4285-abf1-a2022d131f37","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ذكر","wordgroup_id":"1268943c-3e83-40b9-87f3-701e7994bd02"},{"id":103413,"root":"ذكر","root_slug":"Ckr","surah":2,"verse":231,"word_index":26,"arabic_text":"وَإِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَبَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ سَرِّحُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ وَلَا تُمْسِكُوهُنَّ ضِرَارًا لِّتَعْتَدُوا وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُ وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوا آيَاتِ اللَّهِ هُزُوًا وَاذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَمَا أَنزَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنَ الْكِتَابِ وَالْحِكْمَةِ يَعِظُكُم بِهِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ","translation_text":"When you divorce women and they have reached their set time, then either keep or release them in a fair manner. Do not hold on to them with intent to harm them and commit aggression: anyone who does this wrongs himself. in the alternation of night and day; in the ships that sail the seas with goods for people; in the water which God sends down from the sky to give life to the earth when it has been barren, scattering all kinds of creatures over it; in the changing of the winds and clouds that run their appointed courses between the sky and earth: there are signs in all these for those who use their minds","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"ccc59535-92dd-48ab-a31f-006bd7be8aa1","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"خلف","wordgroup_id":"7efa6d07-e183-4518-9a16-d8260d2c4296"},{"id":102527,"root":"خلف","root_slug":"Xlf","surah":2,"verse":176,"word_index":9,"arabic_text":"ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ نَزَّلَ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ وَإِنَّ الَّذِينَ اخْتَلَفُوا فِي الْكِتَابِ لَفِي شِقَاقٍ بَعِيدٍ","translation_text":"This is because God has sent the Scripture with the Truth; You are also forbidden to allot shares &#91;of meat&#93; by drawing marked arrows -a heinous practice- today the disbelievers have lost all hope that you will give up your religion. Do not fear them: fear Me. Today I have perfected your religion for you, completed My blessing upon you, and chosen as your religion islam: &#91;total devotion to God&#93;; but if any of you is forced by hunger to eat forbidden food, with no intention of doing wrong, then God is most forgiving and merciful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1b678af3-cfd4-4ccc-8329-631af4923e75","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"نعم","wordgroup_id":"1c198689-b313-43ff-81a7-d329a49ec536"},{"id":109407,"root":"نعم","root_slug":"nEm","surah":5,"verse":6,"word_index":58,"arabic_text":"يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا قُمْتُمْ إِلَى الصَّلَاةِ فَاغْسِلُوا وُجُوهَكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ إِلَى الْمَرَافِقِ وَامْسَحُوا بِرُءُوسِكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُمْ إِلَى الْكَعْبَيْنِ وَإِن كُنتُمْ جُنُبًا فَاطَّهَّرُوا وَإِن كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰ أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ أَوْ جَاءَ أَحَدٌ مِّنكُم مِّنَ الْغَائِطِ أَوْ لَامَسْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوا مَاءً فَتَيَمَّمُوا صَعِيدًا طَيِّبًا فَامْسَحُوا بِوُجُوهِكُمْ وَأَيْدِيكُم مِّنْهُ مَا يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ لِيَجْعَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْ حَرَجٍ وَلَـٰكِن يُرِيدُ لِيُطَهِّرَكُمْ وَلِيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُ عَلَيْكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ","translation_text":"You who believe, when you are about to pray, wash your faces and your hands up to the elbows, wipe your heads, wash your feet up to the ankles and, if required, wash your whole body. If any of you is sick or on a journey, or has just relieved himself, or had intimate contact with a woman, and can find no water, then take some clean sand and wipe your face and hands with it. God does not wish to place any burden on you: He only wishes to cleanse you and perfect His blessing on you, so that you may be thankful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1b678af3-cfd4-4ccc-8329-631af4923e75","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"نعم","wordgroup_id":"1c198689-b313-43ff-81a7-d329a49ec536"}]}}]}]

The truly good are those who believe in God and the Last Day, in the angels, the Scripture, and the prophets; who give away some of their wealth, however much they cherish it, to their relatives, to orphans, the needy, travellers and beggars, and to liberate those in bondage; those who keep up the prayer and pay the prescribed alms; who keep pledges whenever they make them; who are steadfast in misfortune, adversity, and times of danger. These are the ones who are true, and it is they who are aware of God","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1a3c4882-c14d-47fd-9d47-fb7e2e8f3266","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"صدق","wordgroup_id":"bda8655a-3231-4b0e-b064-c0674724a125"},{"id":102848,"root":"صدق","root_slug":"Sdq","surah":2,"verse":196,"word_index":31,"arabic_text":"وَأَتِمُّوا الْحَجَّ وَالْعُمْرَةَ لِلَّهِ فَإِنْ أُحْصِرْتُمْ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ وَلَا تَحْلِقُوا رُءُوسَكُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَبْلُغَ الْهَدْيُ مَحِلَّهُ فَمَن كَانَ مِنكُم مَّرِيضًا أَوْ بِهِ أَذًى مِّن رَّأْسِهِ فَفِدْيَةٌ مِّن صِيَامٍ أَوْ صَدَقَةٍ أَوْ نُسُكٍ فَإِذَا أَمِنتُمْ فَمَن تَمَتَّعَ بِالْعُمْرَةِ إِلَى الْحَجِّ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ ثَلَاثَةِ أَيَّامٍ فِي الْحَجِّ وَسَبْعَةٍ إِذَا رَجَعْتُمْ تِلْكَ عَشَرَةٌ كَامِلَةٌ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَن لَّمْ يَكُنْ أَهْلُهُ حَاضِرِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ","translation_text":"Complete the pilgrimages, major and minor, for the sake of God. If you are prevented &#91;from doing so&#93;, then &#91;send&#93; whatever offering for sacrifice you can afford, and do not shave your headsuntil the offering has reached the place of sacrifice. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. 69:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ6a:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of everything6b:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ6c:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. If there are only daughters, two or more should share two-thirds of the inheritance, if one, she should have half. Parents inherit a sixth each if the deceased leaves children; if he leaves no children and his parents are his sole heirs, his mother has a third, unless he has brothers, in which case she has a sixth. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. You cannot know which of your parents or your children is more beneficial to you: this is a law from God, and He is all knowing, all wise","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"50462302-ca37-406f-91ad-7ec0d0526e95","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"دين","wordgroup_id":"1c1d2ad1-9551-4dbd-b9c9-c702980a277d"},{"id":106947,"root":"دين","root_slug":"dyn","surah":4,"verse":12,"word_index":25,"arabic_text":"وَلَكُمْ نِصْفُ مَا تَرَكَ أَزْوَاجُكُمْ إِن لَّمْ يَكُن لَّهُنَّ وَلَدٌ فَإِن كَانَ لَهُنَّ وَلَدٌ فَلَكُمُ الرُّبُعُ مِمَّا تَرَكْنَ مِن بَعْدِ وَصِيَّةٍ يُوصِينَ بِهَا أَوْ دَيْنٍ وَلَهُنَّ الرُّبُعُ مِمَّا تَرَكْتُمْ إِن لَّمْ يَكُن لَّكُمْ وَلَدٌ فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ وَلَدٌ فَلَهُنَّ الثُّمُنُ مِمَّا تَرَكْتُم مِّن بَعْدِ وَصِيَّةٍ تُوصُونَ بِهَا أَوْ دَيْنٍ وَإِن كَانَ رَجُلٌ يُورَثُ كَلَالَةً أَوِ امْرَأَةٌ وَلَهُ أَخٌ أَوْ أُخْتٌ فَلِكُلِّ وَاحِدٍ مِّنْهُمَا السُّدُسُ فَإِن كَانُوا أَكْثَرَ مِن ذَٰلِكَ فَهُمْ شُرَكَاءُ فِي الثُّلُثِ مِن بَعْدِ وَصِيَّةٍ يُوصَىٰ بِهَا أَوْ دَيْنٍ غَيْرَ مُضَارٍّ وَصِيَّةً مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٌ","translation_text":"You inherit half of what your wives leave, if they have no children; if they have children, you inherit a quarter. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. If you have no children, your wives&rsquo; share is a quarter; if you have children, your wives get an eighth. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. If a man or a woman dies leaving no children or parents, but a single brother or sister, he or she should take one-sixth of the inheritance; if there are more siblings, they share one-third between them. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts, with no harm done to anyone: this is a commandment from God: God is all knowing and benign to all","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"50462302-ca37-406f-91ad-7ec0d0526e95","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"دين","wordgroup_id":"1c1d2ad1-9551-4dbd-b9c9-c702980a277d"}],"e3dfb660-e24b-4338-b988-a45780acb340":[{"id":100920,"root":"حزن","root_slug":"Hzn","surah":2,"verse":38,"word_index":17,"arabic_text":"قُلْنَا اهْبِطُوا مِنْهَا جَمِيعًا فَإِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّي هُدًى فَمَن تَبِعَ هُدَايَ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ","translation_text":"We said, &lsquo;Get out, all of you! If you are prevented &#91;from doing so&#93;, then &#91;send&#93; whatever offering for sacrifice you can afford, and do not shave your headsuntil the offering has reached the place of sacrifice. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. So any one of you who is present that month should fast, and anyone who is ill or on a journey should make up for the lost days by fasting on other days later. God wants ease for you, not hardship. He wants you to complete the prescribed period and to glorify Him for having guided you, so that you may be thankful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"dd702da8-fd50-45cb-a39a-e09398ba6db1","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"رود","wordgroup_id":"13a4c48a-3773-4ff8-ab46-664d4b8a7262"},{"id":102676,"root":"رود","root_slug":"rwd","surah":2,"verse":185,"word_index":33,"arabic_text":"شَهْرُ رَمَضَانَ الَّذِي أُنزِلَ فِيهِ الْقُرْآنُ هُدًى لِّلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّنَاتٍ مِّنَ الْهُدَىٰ وَالْفُرْقَانِ فَمَن شَهِدَ مِنكُمُ الشَّهْرَ فَلْيَصُمْهُ وَمَن كَانَ مَرِيضًا أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِّنْ أَيَّامٍ أُخَرَ يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ بِكُمُ الْيُسْرَ وَلَا يُرِيدُ بِكُمُ الْعُسْرَ وَلِتُكْمِلُوا الْعِدَّةَ وَلِتُكَبِّرُوا اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَاكُمْ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ","translation_text":"It was in the month of Ramadan that the Quran was revealed as guidance for mankind, clear messages giving guidance and distinguishing between right and wrong. So any one of you who is present that month should fast, and anyone who is ill or on a journey should make up for the lost days by fasting on other days later. God wants ease for you, not hardship. He wants you to complete the prescribed period and to glorify Him for having guided you, so that you may be thankful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"dd702da8-fd50-45cb-a39a-e09398ba6db1","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"رود","wordgroup_id":"13a4c48a-3773-4ff8-ab46-664d4b8a7262"},{"id":103341,"root":"رود","root_slug":"rwd","surah":2,"verse":228,"word_index":28,"arabic_text":"وَالْمُطَلَّقَاتُ يَتَرَبَّصْنَ بِأَنفُسِهِنَّ ثَلَاثَةَ قُرُوءٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَهُنَّ أَن يَكْتُمْنَ مَا خَلَقَ اللَّهُ فِي أَرْحَامِهِنَّ إِن كُنَّ يُؤْمِنَّ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَبُعُولَتُهُنَّ أَحَقُّ بِرَدِّهِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ إِنْ أَرَادُوا إِصْلَاحًا وَلَهُنَّ مِثْلُ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَلِلرِّجَالِ عَلَيْهِنَّ دَرَجَةٌ وَاللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ","translation_text":"Divorced women must wait for three monthly periods before remarrying, and, if they really believe in God and the Last Day, it is not lawful for them to conceal what God has created in their wombs: their husbands would do better to take them back during this period, provided they wish to put things right. Wives have &#91;rights&#93; similar to their &#91;obligations&#93;, according to what is recognized to be fair, and husbands have a degree &#91;of right&#93; over them: &#91;both should remember that&#93; God is almighty and wise","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"dd702da8-fd50-45cb-a39a-e09398ba6db1","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"رود","wordgroup_id":"13a4c48a-3773-4ff8-ab46-664d4b8a7262"},{"id":103453,"root":"رود","root_slug":"rwd","surah":2,"verse":233,"word_index":7,"arabic_text":"وَالْوَالِدَاتُ يُرْضِعْنَ أَوْلَادَهُنَّ حَوْلَيْنِ كَامِلَيْنِ لِمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يُتِمَّ الرَّضَاعَةَ وَعَلَى الْمَوْلُودِ لَهُ رِزْقُهُنَّ وَكِسْوَتُهُنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ لَا تُكَلَّفُ نَفْسٌ إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا لَا تُضَارَّ وَالِدَةٌ بِوَلَدِهَا وَلَا مَوْلُودٌ لَّهُ بِوَلَدِهِ وَعَلَى الْوَارِثِ مِثْلُ ذَٰلِكَ فَإِنْ أَرَادَا فِصَالًا عَن تَرَاضٍ مِّنْهُمَا وَتَشَاوُرٍ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا وَإِنْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن تَسْتَرْضِعُوا أَوْلَادَكُمْ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذَا سَلَّمْتُم مَّا آتَيْتُم بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ","translation_text":"Mothers suckle their children for two whole years, if they wish to complete the term, and clothing and maintenance must be borne by the father in a fair manner. No one should be burdened with more than they can bear: no mother shall be made to suffer harm on account of her child, nor any father on account of his. The same duty is incumbent on the father&rsquo;s heir. If, by mutual consent and consultation, the couple wish to wean &#91;the child&#93;, they will not be blamed, nor will there be any blame if you wish to engage a wet nurse, provided you pay as agreed in a fair manner. Go to Egypt and there you will find what you have asked for.&rsquo; They were struck with humiliation and wretchedness, and they incurred the wrath of God because they persistently rejected His messages and killed prophets contrary to all that is right. Not that Solomon himself was a disbeliever; it was the evil ones who were disbelievers. They taught people witchcraft and what was revealed in Babylon to the two angels Harut and Marut. Yet these two never taught anyone without first warning him, &lsquo;We are sent only to tempt- do not disbelieve.&rsquo; From these two, they learned what can cause discord between man and wife, although they harm no one with it except by God&rsquo;s leave. They learned what harmed them, not what benefited them, knowing full well that whoever gained &#91;this knowledge&#93; would lose any share in the Hereafter. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. When fighting was ordained for them, some of them feared men as much as, or even more than, they feared God, saying, &lsquo;Lord, why have You ordained fighting for us? If only You would give us just a little more time.&rsquo; Say to them, &lsquo;Little is the enjoyment in this world, the Hereafter is far better for those who are mindful of God: you will not be wronged by as much as the fibre in a date stone","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"ede6966e-bcb8-49b9-9d62-2c132dd2c54f","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"رأي","wordgroup_id":"e346b4c0-624b-4e48-99e6-9e255a5bc20d"}]}}]}]
6d:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ6e:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of everything31:["$","$Lb",null,{"whiteSpace":"break-spaces","w":"100%","direction":"column","children":["$","$L66",null,{"id":"7a6f8a6b-27ad-49d5-8407-e5e3145aff22","wordgroups":[{"id":"82ac77cc-59b1-426c-a2f1-f86f78be9f75","body":"ليس","analyses":[{"id":"bbff11ff-eb97-4ea4-9770-583a67f5c5ba","lex":null,"root":"ليس","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"lys","wordgroup_id":"82ac77cc-59b1-426c-a2f1-f86f78be9f75","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"7a6f8a6b-27ad-49d5-8407-e5e3145aff22","order_number":3},{"id":"4a495c3e-9a4e-4af1-82c8-96bf52fe8c5b","body":"يشجيني","analyses":[{"id":"c58fd7ff-6a76-48d1-b50f-6d7a0a818d40","lex":null,"root":"شجو","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"Jjw","wordgroup_id":"4a495c3e-9a4e-4af1-82c8-96bf52fe8c5b","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"7a6f8a6b-27ad-49d5-8407-e5e3145aff22","order_number":4}],"analysesMap":{"82ac77cc-59b1-426c-a2f1-f86f78be9f75":[{"id":101799,"root":"ليس","root_slug":"lys","surah":2,"verse":113,"word_index":9,"arabic_text":"وَقَالَتِ الْيَهُودُ لَيْسَتِ النَّصَارَىٰ عَلَىٰ شَيْءٍ وَقَالَتِ النَّصَارَىٰ لَيْسَتِ الْيَهُودُ عَلَىٰ شَيْءٍ وَهُمْ يَتْلُونَ الْكِتَابَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ الَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ مِثْلَ قَوْلِهِمْ فَاللَّهُ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ فِيمَا كَانُوا فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ","translation_text":"The Jews say, &lsquo;The Christians have no ground whatsoever to stand on,&rsquo; and the Christians say, &lsquo;The Jews have no ground whatsoever to stand on,&rsquo; though they both read the Scripture, and those who have no knowledge say the same; God will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning their differences","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"bbff11ff-eb97-4ea4-9770-583a67f5c5ba","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ليس","wordgroup_id":"82ac77cc-59b1-426c-a2f1-f86f78be9f75"},{"id":101794,"root":"ليس","root_slug":"lys","surah":2,"verse":113,"word_index":3,"arabic_text":"وَقَالَتِ الْيَهُودُ لَيْسَتِ النَّصَارَىٰ عَلَىٰ شَيْءٍ وَقَالَتِ النَّصَارَىٰ لَيْسَتِ الْيَهُودُ عَلَىٰ شَيْءٍ وَهُمْ يَتْلُونَ الْكِتَابَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ الَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ مِثْلَ قَوْلِهِمْ فَاللَّهُ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ فِيمَا كَانُوا فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ","translation_text":"The Jews say, &lsquo;The Christians have no ground whatsoever to stand on,&rsquo; and the Christians say, &lsquo;The Jews have no ground whatsoever to stand on,&rsquo; though they both read the Scripture, and those who have no knowledge say the same; God will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning their differences","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"bbff11ff-eb97-4ea4-9770-583a67f5c5ba","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ليس","wordgroup_id":"82ac77cc-59b1-426c-a2f1-f86f78be9f75"},{"id":102531,"root":"ليس","root_slug":"lys","surah":2,"verse":177,"word_index":1,"arabic_text":"لَّيْسَ الْبِرَّ أَن تُوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ قِبَلَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنْ آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةِ وَالْكِتَابِ وَالنَّبِيِّينَ وَآتَى الْمَالَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ ذَوِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينَ وَابْنَ السَّبِيلِ وَالسَّائِلِينَ وَفِي الرِّقَابِ وَأَقَامَ الصَّلَاةَ وَآتَى الزَّكَاةَ وَالْمُوفُونَ بِعَهْدِهِمْ إِذَا عَاهَدُوا وَالصَّابِرِينَ فِي الْبَأْسَاءِ وَالضَّرَّاءِ وَحِينَ الْبَأْسِ أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا وَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُتَّقُونَ","translation_text":"Goodness does not consist in turning your face towards East or West. The truly good are those who believe in God and the Last Day, in the angels, the Scripture, and the prophets; who give away some of their wealth, however much they cherish it, to their relatives, to orphans, the needy, travellers and beggars, and to liberate those in bondage; those who keep up the prayer and pay the prescribed alms; who keep pledges whenever they make them; who are steadfast in misfortune, adversity, and times of danger. Go to Egypt and there you will find what you have asked for.&rsquo; They were struck with humiliation and wretchedness, and they incurred the wrath of God because they persistently rejected His messages and killed prophets contrary to all that is right. 6f:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ70:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of everything34:["$","$Lb",null,{"whiteSpace":"break-spaces","w":"100%","direction":"column","children":["$","$L66",null,{"id":"6ab7be72-d5f5-4a20-a2ae-f8c1e05f94a6","wordgroups":[{"id":"286d0499-4665-4ec8-a70b-730cae31b26e","body":"أياصر","analyses":[{"id":"b7640b90-6634-484c-b680-95b39809cc5f","lex":null,"root":"أصر","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"aSr","wordgroup_id":"286d0499-4665-4ec8-a70b-730cae31b26e","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"6ab7be72-d5f5-4a20-a2ae-f8c1e05f94a6","order_number":1},{"id":"66d68dc3-3bde-42e3-8a2e-77771f0a590a","body":"قربى","analyses":[{"id":"58ec852d-204f-4b09-bfde-a74781bde182","lex":null,"root":"قرب","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"qrb","wordgroup_id":"66d68dc3-3bde-42e3-8a2e-77771f0a590a","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"6ab7be72-d5f5-4a20-a2ae-f8c1e05f94a6","order_number":2},{"id":"a8e18b32-8441-4d58-a73f-062f3625b28d","body":"لست","analyses":[{"id":"fced6672-d9f7-4d5d-a4be-4d4a575103cd","lex":null,"root":"ليس","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"lys","wordgroup_id":"a8e18b32-8441-4d58-a73f-062f3625b28d","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"6ab7be72-d5f5-4a20-a2ae-f8c1e05f94a6","order_number":3},{"id":"a0a40fde-0981-4f45-b43d-8439781b24ed","body":"تحفظها","analyses":[{"id":"b4f27b98-d7aa-428e-b80b-8d5444e8326f","lex":null,"root":"حفظ","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"HfZ","wordgroup_id":"a0a40fde-0981-4f45-b43d-8439781b24ed","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"6ab7be72-d5f5-4a20-a2ae-f8c1e05f94a6","order_number":4}],"analysesMap":{"66d68dc3-3bde-42e3-8a2e-77771f0a590a":[{"id":100888,"root":"قرب","root_slug":"qrb","surah":2,"verse":35,"word_index":13,"arabic_text":"وَقُلْنَا يَا آدَمُ اسْكُنْ أَنتَ وَزَوْجُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَكُلَا مِنْهَا رَغَدًا حَيْثُ شِئْتُمَا وَلَا تَقْرَبَا هَـٰذِهِ الشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ","translation_text":"We said, &lsquo;Adam, live with your wife in this garden. God was aware that you were betraying yourselves, so He turned to you in mercy and pardoned you: now you can lie with them- seek what God has ordained for you- eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. All that is in the heavens and in the earth belongs to Him. Who is there that can intercede with Him except by His leave? He knows what is before them and what is behind them, but they do not comprehend any of His knowledge except what He wills. His throne extends over the heavens and the earth; it does not weary Him to preserve them both. Lord, do not burden us as You burdened those before us. Lord, do not burden us with more than we have strength to bear. Pardon us, forgive us, and have mercy on us. You are our Protector, so help us against the disbelievers.&rsquo;","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b7640b90-6634-484c-b680-95b39809cc5f","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أصر","wordgroup_id":"286d0499-4665-4ec8-a70b-730cae31b26e"}]}}]}]

71:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ72:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of everything38:["$","$Lb",null,{"whiteSpace":"break-spaces","w":"100%","direction":"column","children":["$","$L66",null,{"id":"bd8bc513-2e61-4342-b1cb-8fac888f5391","wordgroups":[{"id":"c569c750-485c-4628-aa73-b16cadef1fe9","body":"يقبض","analyses":[{"id":"04e907b3-1e99-4a4a-bb4a-494ed7c014f0","lex":null,"root":"قبض","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"qbD","wordgroup_id":"c569c750-485c-4628-aa73-b16cadef1fe9","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"bd8bc513-2e61-4342-b1cb-8fac888f5391","order_number":2},{"id":"060a7862-c089-4167-99d8-cfeca83633d8","body":"الدنيا","analyses":[{"id":"1de73c9d-f10c-48a7-834c-868b1042c548","lex":null,"root":"دنو","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"dnw","wordgroup_id":"060a7862-c089-4167-99d8-cfeca83633d8","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"bd8bc513-2e61-4342-b1cb-8fac888f5391","order_number":3},{"id":"45f711f8-576b-4ebf-ba7d-2e3d3f26d063","body":"ويبسطها","analyses":[{"id":"2f739873-7a30-4240-ad72-07e6f5858fec","lex":null,"root":"بسط","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"bsT","wordgroup_id":"45f711f8-576b-4ebf-ba7d-2e3d3f26d063","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"bd8bc513-2e61-4342-b1cb-8fac888f5391","order_number":4}],"analysesMap":{"060a7862-c089-4167-99d8-cfeca83633d8":[{"id":101130,"root":"دنو","root_slug":"dnw","surah":2,"verse":61,"word_index":27,"arabic_text":"وَإِذْ قُلْتُمْ يَا مُوسَىٰ لَن نَّصْبِرَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامٍ وَاحِدٍ فَادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُخْرِجْ لَنَا مِمَّا تُنبِتُ الْأَرْضُ مِن بَقْلِهَا وَقِثَّائِهَا وَفُومِهَا وَعَدَسِهَا وَبَصَلِهَا قَالَ أَتَسْتَبْدِلُونَ الَّذِي هُوَ أَدْنَىٰ بِالَّذِي هُوَ خَيْرٌ اهْبِطُوا مِصْرًا فَإِنَّ لَكُم مَّا سَأَلْتُمْ وَضُرِبَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ الذِّلَّةُ وَالْمَسْكَنَةُ وَبَاءُوا بِغَضَبٍ مِّنَ اللَّهِ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا يَكْفُرُونَ بِآيَاتِ اللَّهِ وَيَقْتُلُونَ النَّبِيِّينَ بِغَيْرِ الْحَقِّ ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا عَصَوا وَّكَانُوا يَعْتَدُونَ","translation_text":"Remember when you said, &lsquo;Moses, we cannot bear to eat only one kind of food, so pray to your Lord to bring out for us some of the earth&rsquo;s produce, its herbs and cucumbers, its garlic, lentils, and onions.&rsquo; He said, &lsquo;Would you exchange better for worse? Go to Egypt and there you will find what you have asked for.&rsquo; They were struck with humiliation and wretchedness, and they incurred the wrath of God because they persistently rejected His messages and killed prophets contrary to all that is right. All this was because they disobeyed and were lawbreakers","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1de73c9d-f10c-48a7-834c-868b1042c548","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"دنو","wordgroup_id":"060a7862-c089-4167-99d8-cfeca83633d8"},{"id":101426,"root":"دنو","root_slug":"dnw","surah":2,"verse":85,"word_index":38,"arabic_text":"ثُمَّ أَنتُمْ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ تَقْتُلُونَ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَتُخْرِجُونَ فَرِيقًا مِّنكُم مِّن دِيَارِهِمْ تَظَاهَرُونَ عَلَيْهِم بِالْإِثْمِ وَالْعُدْوَانِ وَإِن يَأْتُوكُمْ أُسَارَىٰ تُفَادُوهُمْ وَهُوَ مُحَرَّمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ إِخْرَاجُهُمْ أَفَتُؤْمِنُونَ بِبَعْضِ الْكِتَابِ وَتَكْفُرُونَ بِبَعْضٍ فَمَا جَزَاءُ مَن يَفْعَلُ ذَٰلِكَ مِنكُمْ إِلَّا خِزْيٌ فِي الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا وَيَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ يُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ أَشَدِّ الْعَذَابِ وَمَا اللَّهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ","translation_text":"Yet here you are, killing one another and driving some of your own people from their homes, helping one another in sin and aggression against them. God was aware that you were betraying yourselves, so He turned to you in mercy and pardoned you: now you can lie with them- seek what God has ordained for you- eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. Anyone who drinks from it will not belong with me, but anyone who refrains from tasting it will belong with me; if he scoops up just one handful &#91;he will be excused&#93;.&rsquo; But they all drank &#91;deep&#93; from it, except for a few. When he crossed it with those who had kept faith, they said, &lsquo;We have no strength today against Goliath and his warriors.&rsquo; But those who knew that they were going to meet their Lord said, &lsquo;How often a small force has defeated a large army with God&rsquo;s permission! God is with those who are steadfast.&rsquo;","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"757be913-4a98-48c5-badf-b7ca9b71acdc","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"شرب","wordgroup_id":"059e2d5b-d41d-44e8-abe7-7c4bf2e76835"},{"id":103725,"root":"شرب","root_slug":"Jrb","surah":2,"verse":249,"word_index":11,"arabic_text":"فَلَمَّا فَصَلَ طَالُوتُ بِالْجُنُودِ قَالَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مُبْتَلِيكُم بِنَهَرٍ فَمَن شَرِبَ مِنْهُ فَلَيْسَ مِنِّي وَمَن لَّمْ يَطْعَمْهُ فَإِنَّهُ مِنِّي إِلَّا مَنِ اغْتَرَفَ غُرْفَةً بِيَدِهِ فَشَرِبُوا مِنْهُ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا مِّنْهُمْ فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَهُ هُوَ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مَعَهُ قَالُوا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا الْيَوْمَ بِجَالُوتَ وَجُنُودِهِ قَالَ الَّذِينَ يَظُنُّونَ أَنَّهُم مُّلَاقُو اللَّهِ كَم مِّن فِئَةٍ قَلِيلَةٍ غَلَبَتْ فِئَةً كَثِيرَةً بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ وَاللَّهُ مَعَ الصَّابِرِينَ","translation_text":"When Talut set out with his forces, he said to them, &lsquo;God will test you with a river. Anyone who drinks from it will not belong with me, but anyone who refrains from tasting it will belong with me; if he scoops up just one handful &#91;he will be excused&#93;.&rsquo; But they all drank &#91;deep&#93; from it, except for a few. When he crossed it with those who had kept faith, they said, &lsquo;We have no strength today against Goliath and his warriors.&rsquo; But those who knew that they were going to meet their Lord said, &lsquo;How often a small force has defeated a large army with God&rsquo;s permission! He said, &lsquo;How will God give this life when it has died?&rsquo; So God made him die for a hundred years, and then raised him up, saying, &lsquo;How long did you stay like that?&rsquo; He answered, &lsquo;A day, or part of a day.&rsquo; God said, &lsquo;No, you stayed like that for a hundred years. Look at your food and drink: they have not gone bad. Anyone who drinks from it will not belong with me, but anyone who refrains from tasting it will belong with me; if he scoops up just one handful &#91;he will be excused&#93;.&rsquo; But they all drank &#91;deep&#93; from it, except for a few. When he crossed it with those who had kept faith, they said, &lsquo;We have no strength today against Goliath and his warriors.&rsquo; But those who knew that they were going to meet their Lord said, &lsquo;How often a small force has defeated a large army with God&rsquo;s permission! God is with those who are steadfast.&rsquo;","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"e3e0e04e-9923-424e-a5da-127dd22f89c7","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"شرب","wordgroup_id":"83c0d894-7a2a-424e-8caf-6cf84cf452df"},{"id":103943,"root":"شرب","root_slug":"Jrb","surah":2,"verse":259,"word_index":40,"arabic_text":"أَوْ كَالَّذِي مَرَّ عَلَىٰ قَرْيَةٍ وَهِيَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا قَالَ أَنَّىٰ يُحْيِي هَـٰذِهِ اللَّهُ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا فَأَمَاتَهُ اللَّهُ مِائَةَ عَامٍ ثُمَّ بَعَثَهُ قَالَ كَمْ لَبِثْتَ قَالَ لَبِثْتُ يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ قَالَ بَل لَّبِثْتَ مِائَةَ عَامٍ فَانظُرْ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِكَ وَشَرَابِكَ لَمْ يَتَسَنَّهْ وَانظُرْ إِلَىٰ حِمَارِكَ وَلِنَجْعَلَكَ آيَةً لِّلنَّاسِ وَانظُرْ إِلَى الْعِظَامِ كَيْفَ نُنشِزُهَا ثُمَّ نَكْسُوهَا لَحْمًا فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُ قَالَ أَعْلَمُ أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ","translation_text":"Or take the one who passed by a ruined town. He said, &lsquo;How will God give this life when it has died?&rsquo; So God made him die for a hundred years, and then raised him up, saying, &lsquo;How long did you stay like that?&rsquo; He answered, &lsquo;A day, or part of a day.&rsquo; God said, &lsquo;No, you stayed like that for a hundred years. Look at your food and drink: they have not gone bad. If you are prevented &#91;from doing so&#93;, then &#91;send&#93; whatever offering for sacrifice you can afford, and do not shave your headsuntil the offering has reached the place of sacrifice. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. You will not be answerable for their deeds","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1dc5d0b6-0562-4c3f-b0ad-f404088b1d55","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أمم","wordgroup_id":"3251d00d-3dad-4ce0-9914-2293bcf271f3"},{"id":102133,"root":"أمم","root_slug":"amm","surah":2,"verse":143,"word_index":3,"arabic_text":"وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَاكُمْ أُمَّةً وَسَطًا لِّتَكُونُوا شُهَدَاءَ عَلَى النَّاسِ وَيَكُونَ الرَّسُولُ عَلَيْكُمْ شَهِيدًا وَمَا جَعَلْنَا الْقِبْلَةَ الَّتِي كُنتَ عَلَيْهَا إِلَّا لِنَعْلَمَ مَن يَتَّبِعُ الرَّسُولَ مِمَّن يَنقَلِبُ عَلَىٰ عَقِبَيْهِ وَإِن كَانَتْ لَكَبِيرَةً إِلَّا عَلَى الَّذِينَ هَدَى اللَّهُ وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ لِيُضِيعَ إِيمَانَكُمْ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِالنَّاسِ لَرَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ","translation_text":"We have made you &#91;believers&#93; into a just community, so that you may bear witness &#91;to the truth&#93; before others and so that the Messenger may bear witness &#91;to it&#93; before you. We only made the direction the one you used to face &#91;Prophet&#93; in order to distinguish those who follow the Messenger from those who turn on their heels: that test was hard, except for those God has guided. God would never let your faith go to waste &#91;believers&#93;, for God is most compassionate and most merciful towards people","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1dc5d0b6-0562-4c3f-b0ad-f404088b1d55","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أمم","wordgroup_id":"3251d00d-3dad-4ce0-9914-2293bcf271f3"},{"id":103062,"root":"أمم","root_slug":"amm","surah":2,"verse":213,"word_index":3,"arabic_text":"كَانَ النَّاسُ أُمَّةً وَاحِدَةً فَبَعَثَ اللَّهُ النَّبِيِّينَ مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ وَأَنزَلَ مَعَهُمُ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ فِيمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ وَمَا اخْتَلَفَ فِيهِ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ أُوتُوهُ مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَاتُ بَغْيًا بَيْنَهُمْ فَهَدَى اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لِمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ مِنَ الْحَقِّ بِإِذْنِهِ وَاللَّهُ يَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ","translation_text":"Mankind was a single community, then God sent prophets to bring good news and warning, and with them He sent the Scripture with the Truth, to judge between people in their disagreements. It was only those to whom it was given who disagreed about it after clear signs had come to them, because of rivalry between them. So by His leave God guided the believers to the truth they had differed about: God guides whoever He will to a straight path","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1dc5d0b6-0562-4c3f-b0ad-f404088b1d55","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أمم","wordgroup_id":"3251d00d-3dad-4ce0-9914-2293bcf271f3"},{"id":104508,"root":"أمم","root_slug":"amm","surah":3,"verse":7,"word_index":10,"arabic_text":"هُوَ الَّذِي أَنزَلَ عَلَيْكَ الْكِتَابَ مِنْهُ آيَاتٌ مُّحْكَمَاتٌ هُنَّ أُمُّ الْكِتَابِ وَأُخَرُ مُتَشَابِهَاتٌ فَأَمَّا الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ زَيْغٌ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ مَا تَشَابَهَ مِنْهُ ابْتِغَاءَ الْفِتْنَةِ وَابْتِغَاءَ تَأْوِيلِهِ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ تَأْوِيلَهُ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَالرَّاسِخُونَ فِي الْعِلْمِ يَقُولُونَ آمَنَّا بِهِ كُلٌّ مِّنْ عِندِ رَبِّنَا وَمَا يَذَّكَّرُ إِلَّا أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ","translation_text":"it is He who has sent this Scripture down to you &#91;Prophet&#93;. Some of its verses are definite in meaning- these are the cornerstone of the Scripture- and others are ambiguous. The perverse at heart eagerly pursue the ambiguities in their attempt to make trouble and to pin down a specific meaning of their own: only God knows the true meaning. Those firmly grounded in knowledge say, &lsquo;We believe in it: it is all from our Lord&rsquo;- only those with real perception will take heed","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1dc5d0b6-0562-4c3f-b0ad-f404088b1d55","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أمم","wordgroup_id":"3251d00d-3dad-4ce0-9914-2293bcf271f3"},{"id":104684,"root":"أمم","root_slug":"amm","surah":3,"verse":20,"word_index":13,"arabic_text":"فَإِنْ حَاجُّوكَ فَقُلْ أَسْلَمْتُ وَجْهِيَ لِلَّهِ وَمَنِ اتَّبَعَنِ وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْأُمِّيِّينَ أَأَسْلَمْتُمْ فَإِنْ أَسْلَمُوا فَقَدِ اهْتَدَوا وَّإِن تَوَلَّوْا فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيْكَ الْبَلَاغُ وَاللَّهُ بَصِيرٌ بِالْعِبَادِ","translation_text":"if they argue with you &#91;Prophet&#93;, say, &lsquo;I have devoted myself to God alone and so have my followers.&rsquo; Ask those who were given the Scripture, as well as those without one, &lsquo;Do you too devote yourselves to Him alone?&rsquo; If they do, they will be guided, but if they turn away, your only duty is to convey the message. God is aware of His servants","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1dc5d0b6-0562-4c3f-b0ad-f404088b1d55","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أمم","wordgroup_id":"3251d00d-3dad-4ce0-9914-2293bcf271f3"},{"id":105297,"root":"أمم","root_slug":"amm","surah":3,"verse":75,"word_index":29,"arabic_text":"وَمِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ مَنْ إِن تَأْمَنْهُ بِقِنطَارٍ يُؤَدِّهِ إِلَيْكَ وَمِنْهُم مَّنْ إِن تَأْمَنْهُ بِدِينَارٍ لَّا يُؤَدِّهِ إِلَيْكَ إِلَّا مَا دُمْتَ عَلَيْهِ قَائِمًا ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا لَيْسَ عَلَيْنَا فِي الْأُمِّيِّينَ سَبِيلٌ وَيَقُولُونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ الْكَذِبَ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"There are People of the Book who, if you &#91;Prophet&#93; They tell a lie against God and they know it","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1dc5d0b6-0562-4c3f-b0ad-f404088b1d55","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أمم","wordgroup_id":"3251d00d-3dad-4ce0-9914-2293bcf271f3"},{"id":105611,"root":"أمم","root_slug":"amm","surah":3,"verse":104,"word_index":3,"arabic_text":"وَلْتَكُن مِّنكُمْ أُمَّةٌ يَدْعُونَ إِلَى الْخَيْرِ وَيَأْمُرُونَ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَيَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ الْمُنكَرِ وَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ","translation_text":"Be a community that calls for what is good, urges what is right, and forbids what is wrong: those who do this are the successful ones","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1dc5d0b6-0562-4c3f-b0ad-f404088b1d55","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أمم","wordgroup_id":"3251d00d-3dad-4ce0-9914-2293bcf271f3"},{"id":105662,"root":"أمم","root_slug":"amm","surah":3,"verse":110,"word_index":3,"arabic_text":"كُنتُمْ خَيْرَ أُمَّةٍ أُخْرِجَتْ لِلنَّاسِ تَأْمُرُونَ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَتَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ الْمُنكَرِ وَتُؤْمِنُونَ بِاللَّهِ وَلَوْ آمَنَ أَهْلُ الْكِتَابِ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُم مِّنْهُمُ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَأَكْثَرُهُمُ الْفَاسِقُونَ","translation_text":"&#91;Believers&#93;, you are the best community singled out for people: you order what is right, forbid what is wrong, and believe in God. If the People of the Book had also believed, it would have been better for them. There are some among the People of the Book who are upright, who recite God&rsquo;s revelations during the night, who bow down in worship","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1dc5d0b6-0562-4c3f-b0ad-f404088b1d55","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أمم","wordgroup_id":"3251d00d-3dad-4ce0-9914-2293bcf271f3"},{"id":106917,"root":"أمم","root_slug":"amm","surah":4,"verse":11,"word_index":47,"arabic_text":"يُوصِيكُمُ اللَّهُ فِي أَوْلَادِكُمْ لِلذَّكَرِ مِثْلُ حَظِّ الْأُنثَيَيْنِ فَإِن كُنَّ نِسَاءً فَوْقَ اثْنَتَيْنِ فَلَهُنَّ ثُلُثَا مَا تَرَكَ وَإِن كَانَتْ وَاحِدَةً فَلَهَا النِّصْفُ وَلِأَبَوَيْهِ لِكُلِّ وَاحِدٍ مِّنْهُمَا السُّدُسُ مِمَّا تَرَكَ إِن كَانَ لَهُ وَلَدٌ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُن لَّهُ وَلَدٌ وَوَرِثَهُ أَبَوَاهُ فَلِأُمِّهِ الثُّلُثُ فَإِن كَانَ لَهُ إِخْوَةٌ فَلِأُمِّهِ السُّدُسُ مِن بَعْدِ وَصِيَّةٍ يُوصِي بِهَا أَوْ دَيْنٍ آبَاؤُكُمْ وَأَبْنَاؤُكُمْ لَا تَدْرُونَ أَيُّهُمْ أَقْرَبُ لَكُمْ نَفْعًا فَرِيضَةً مِّنَ اللَّهِ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا","translation_text":"Concerning your children, God commands you that a son should have the equivalent share of two daughters. If there are only daughters, two or more should share two-thirds of the inheritance, if one, she should have half. Parents inherit a sixth each if the deceased leaves children; if he leaves no children and his parents are his sole heirs, his mother has a third, unless he has brothers, in which case she has a sixth. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. You cannot know which of your parents or your children is more beneficial to you: this is a law from God, and He is all knowing, all wise","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1dc5d0b6-0562-4c3f-b0ad-f404088b1d55","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أمم","wordgroup_id":"3251d00d-3dad-4ce0-9914-2293bcf271f3"},{"id":106913,"root":"أمم","root_slug":"amm","surah":4,"verse":11,"word_index":41,"arabic_text":"يُوصِيكُمُ اللَّهُ فِي أَوْلَادِكُمْ لِلذَّكَرِ مِثْلُ حَظِّ الْأُنثَيَيْنِ فَإِن كُنَّ نِسَاءً فَوْقَ اثْنَتَيْنِ فَلَهُنَّ ثُلُثَا مَا تَرَكَ وَإِن كَانَتْ وَاحِدَةً فَلَهَا النِّصْفُ وَلِأَبَوَيْهِ لِكُلِّ وَاحِدٍ مِّنْهُمَا السُّدُسُ مِمَّا تَرَكَ إِن كَانَ لَهُ وَلَدٌ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُن لَّهُ وَلَدٌ وَوَرِثَهُ أَبَوَاهُ فَلِأُمِّهِ الثُّلُثُ فَإِن كَانَ لَهُ إِخْوَةٌ فَلِأُمِّهِ السُّدُسُ مِن بَعْدِ وَصِيَّةٍ يُوصِي بِهَا أَوْ دَيْنٍ آبَاؤُكُمْ وَأَبْنَاؤُكُمْ لَا تَدْرُونَ أَيُّهُمْ أَقْرَبُ لَكُمْ نَفْعًا فَرِيضَةً مِّنَ اللَّهِ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا","translation_text":"Concerning your children, God commands you that a son should have the equivalent share of two daughters. If there are only daughters, two or more should share two-thirds of the inheritance, if one, she should have half. Parents inherit a sixth each if the deceased leaves children; if he leaves no children and his parents are his sole heirs, his mother has a third, unless he has brothers, in which case she has a sixth. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. You cannot know which of your parents or your children is more beneficial to you: this is a law from God, and He is all knowing, all wise","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1dc5d0b6-0562-4c3f-b0ad-f404088b1d55","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أمم","wordgroup_id":"3251d00d-3dad-4ce0-9914-2293bcf271f3"},{"id":107114,"root":"أمم","root_slug":"amm","surah":4,"verse":23,"word_index":3,"arabic_text":"حُرِّمَتْ عَلَيْكُمْ أُمَّهَاتُكُمْ وَبَنَاتُكُمْ وَأَخَوَاتُكُمْ وَعَمَّاتُكُمْ وَخَالَاتُكُمْ وَبَنَاتُ الْأَخِ وَبَنَاتُ الْأُخْتِ وَأُمَّهَاتُكُمُ اللَّاتِي أَرْضَعْنَكُمْ وَأَخَوَاتُكُم مِّنَ الرَّضَاعَةِ وَأُمَّهَاتُ نِسَائِكُمْ وَرَبَائِبُكُمُ اللَّاتِي فِي حُجُورِكُم مِّن نِّسَائِكُمُ اللَّاتِي دَخَلْتُم بِهِنَّ فَإِن لَّمْ تَكُونُوا دَخَلْتُم بِهِنَّ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَحَلَائِلُ أَبْنَائِكُمُ الَّذِينَ مِنْ أَصْلَابِكُمْ وَأَن تَجْمَعُوا بَيْنَ الْأُخْتَيْنِ إِلَّا مَا قَدْ سَلَفَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا","translation_text":"You are forbidden to take as wives your mothers, daughters, sisters, paternal and maternal aunts, the daughters of brothers and daughters of sisters, your milk-mothers and milk-sisters, your wives&rsquo; mothers, the stepdaughters in your care- those born of women with whom you have consummated marriage, if you have not consummated the marriage, then you will not be blamed- wives of your begotten sons, two sisters simultaneously- with the exception of what is past: God is most forgiving and merciful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1dc5d0b6-0562-4c3f-b0ad-f404088b1d55","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أمم","wordgroup_id":"3251d00d-3dad-4ce0-9914-2293bcf271f3"},{"id":107123,"root":"أمم","root_slug":"amm","surah":4,"verse":23,"word_index":12,"arabic_text":"حُرِّمَتْ عَلَيْكُمْ أُمَّهَاتُكُمْ وَبَنَاتُكُمْ وَأَخَوَاتُكُمْ وَعَمَّاتُكُمْ وَخَالَاتُكُمْ وَبَنَاتُ الْأَخِ وَبَنَاتُ الْأُخْتِ وَأُمَّهَاتُكُمُ اللَّاتِي أَرْضَعْنَكُمْ وَأَخَوَاتُكُم مِّنَ الرَّضَاعَةِ وَأُمَّهَاتُ نِسَائِكُمْ وَرَبَائِبُكُمُ اللَّاتِي فِي حُجُورِكُم مِّن نِّسَائِكُمُ اللَّاتِي دَخَلْتُم بِهِنَّ فَإِن لَّمْ تَكُونُوا دَخَلْتُم بِهِنَّ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَحَلَائِلُ أَبْنَائِكُمُ الَّذِينَ مِنْ أَصْلَابِكُمْ وَأَن تَجْمَعُوا بَيْنَ الْأُخْتَيْنِ إِلَّا مَا قَدْ سَلَفَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا","translation_text":"You are forbidden to take as wives your mothers, daughters, sisters, paternal and maternal aunts, the daughters of brothers and daughters of sisters, your milk-mothers and milk-sisters, your wives&rsquo; words: they say, &lsquo;We hear and disobey,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Listen,&rsquo; &#91;adding the insult&#93; &lsquo;May you not hear,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Raina &#91;Look at us&#93;,&rsquo; twisting it abusively with their tongues so as to disparage religion. If they had said, &lsquo;We hear and obey,&rsquo; &lsquo;Listen,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Unzurna &#91;Look at us&#93;,&rsquo; that would have been better and more proper for them. But God has spurned them for their defiance; they believe very little","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"58125e95-508a-436d-a036-8cbb8c011738","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"رعي","wordgroup_id":"0ebec6a4-7409-40b2-ba18-585f753cd410"}],"87c63f67-c29f-4c94-8d98-21909bc20cc1":[{"id":108307,"root":"سلح","root_slug":"slH","surah":4,"verse":102,"word_index":54,"arabic_text":"وَإِذَا كُنتَ فِيهِمْ فَأَقَمْتَ لَهُمُ الصَّلَاةَ فَلْتَقُمْ طَائِفَةٌ مِّنْهُم مَّعَكَ وَلْيَأْخُذُوا أَسْلِحَتَهُمْ فَإِذَا سَجَدُوا فَلْيَكُونُوا مِن وَرَائِكُمْ وَلْتَأْتِ طَائِفَةٌ أُخْرَىٰ لَمْ يُصَلُّوا فَلْيُصَلُّوا مَعَكَ وَلْيَأْخُذُوا حِذْرَهُمْ وَأَسْلِحَتَهُمْ وَدَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَوْ تَغْفُلُونَ عَنْ أَسْلِحَتِكُمْ وَأَمْتِعَتِكُمْ فَيَمِيلُونَ عَلَيْكُم مَّيْلَةً وَاحِدَةً وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِن كَانَ بِكُمْ أَذًى مِّن مَّطَرٍ أَوْ كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰ أَن تَضَعُوا أَسْلِحَتَكُمْ وَخُذُوا حِذْرَكُمْ إِنَّ اللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلْكَافِرِينَ عَذَابًا مُّهِينًا","translation_text":"When you &#91;Prophet&#93; are with the believers, leading them in prayer, let a group of them stand up in prayer with you, taking their weapons with them, and when they have finished their prostration, let them take up their positions at the back. Then let the other group, who have not yet prayed, pray with you, also on their guard and armed with their weapons: the disbelievers would dearly like you to be heedless of your weapons and baggage, in order for them to take you in a single assault. You will not be blamed if you lay aside your arms when you are overtaken by heavy rain or illness, but be on your guard. Indeed, God has prepared a humiliating punishment for the disbelievers","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"2f96d7ff-7eaf-481c-88c6-3148aad5e704","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"سلح","wordgroup_id":"87c63f67-c29f-4c94-8d98-21909bc20cc1"},{"id":108295,"root":"سلح","root_slug":"slH","surah":4,"verse":102,"word_index":34,"arabic_text":"وَإِذَا كُنتَ فِيهِمْ فَأَقَمْتَ لَهُمُ الصَّلَاةَ فَلْتَقُمْ طَائِفَةٌ مِّنْهُم مَّعَكَ وَلْيَأْخُذُوا أَسْلِحَتَهُمْ فَإِذَا سَجَدُوا فَلْيَكُونُوا مِن وَرَائِكُمْ وَلْتَأْتِ طَائِفَةٌ أُخْرَىٰ لَمْ يُصَلُّوا فَلْيُصَلُّوا مَعَكَ وَلْيَأْخُذُوا حِذْرَهُمْ وَأَسْلِحَتَهُمْ وَدَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَوْ تَغْفُلُونَ عَنْ أَسْلِحَتِكُمْ وَأَمْتِعَتِكُمْ فَيَمِيلُونَ عَلَيْكُم مَّيْلَةً وَاحِدَةً وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِن كَانَ بِكُمْ أَذًى مِّن مَّطَرٍ أَوْ كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰ أَن تَضَعُوا أَسْلِحَتَكُمْ وَخُذُوا حِذْرَكُمْ إِنَّ اللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلْكَافِرِينَ عَذَابًا مُّهِينًا","translation_text":"When you &#91;Prophet&#93; are with the believers, leading them in prayer, let a group of them stand up in prayer with you, taking their weapons with them, and when they have finished their prostration, let them take up their positions at the back. He said, &lsquo;But could it be that you would not fight, if it were ordained for you?&rsquo; They said, &lsquo;How could we not fight in God&rsquo;s cause when we and our children have been driven out of our homeland?&rsquo; Yet when they were commanded to fight, all but a few of them turned away: God has full knowledge of those who do wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"8c5c8cbe-071b-4947-a7e0-c40a92e3c6b8","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"رأي","wordgroup_id":"33bcc620-8007-4ae0-947c-3325f89cc8b9"},{"id":103890,"root":"رأي","root_slug":"ray","surah":2,"verse":258,"word_index":2,"arabic_text":"أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى الَّذِي حَاجَّ إِبْرَاهِيمَ فِي رَبِّهِ أَنْ آتَاهُ اللَّهُ الْمُلْكَ إِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَاهِيمُ رَبِّيَ الَّذِي يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ قَالَ أَنَا أُحْيِي وَأُمِيتُ قَالَ إِبْرَاهِيمُ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ يَأْتِي بِالشَّمْسِ مِنَ الْمَشْرِقِ فَأْتِ بِهَا مِنَ الْمَغْرِبِ فَبُهِتَ الَّذِي كَفَرَ وَاللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الظَّالِمِينَ","translation_text":"&#91;Prophet&#93;, have you not thought about the man who disputed with Abraham about his Lord, because God had given him power to rule? When Abraham said, &lsquo;It is my Lord who gives life and death,&rsquo; he said, &lsquo;I too give life and death.&rsquo; So Abraham said, &lsquo;God brings the sun from the east; so bring it from the west.&rsquo; The disbeliever was dumbfounded: God does not guide those who do evil","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"8c5c8cbe-071b-4947-a7e0-c40a92e3c6b8","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"رأي","wordgroup_id":"33bcc620-8007-4ae0-947c-3325f89cc8b9"},{"id":103965,"root":"رأي","root_slug":"ray","surah":2,"verse":260,"word_index":5,"arabic_text":"وَإِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَاهِيمُ رَبِّ أَرِنِي كَيْفَ تُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ قَالَ أَوَلَمْ تُؤْمِن قَالَ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِن لِّيَطْمَئِنَّ قَلْبِي قَالَ فَخُذْ أَرْبَعَةً مِّنَ الطَّيْرِ فَصُرْهُنَّ إِلَيْكَ ثُمَّ اجْعَلْ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ جَبَلٍ مِّنْهُنَّ جُزْءًا ثُمَّ ادْعُهُنَّ يَأْتِينَكَ سَعْيًا وَاعْلَمْ أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ","translation_text":"And when Abraham said, &lsquo;My Lord, show me how You give life to the dead,&rsquo; He said, &lsquo;Do you not believe, then?&rsquo; &lsquo;Yes,&rsquo; said Abraham, &lsquo;but just to put my heart at rest.&rsquo; So God said, &lsquo;Take four birds and train them to come back to you. If they had said, &lsquo;We hear and obey,&rsquo; &lsquo;Listen,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Unzurna &#91;Look at us&#93;,&rsquo; that would have been better and more proper for them. But God has spurned them for their defiance; they believe very little","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"c7fed37b-4140-4d7c-9826-710aa37edfb7","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"رعي","wordgroup_id":"6270fc58-5f0c-4342-92dd-abc95d350c09"}]}}]}]
73:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ74:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of everything75:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ76:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of everything47:["$","$Lb",null,{"whiteSpace":"break-spaces","w":"100%","direction":"column","children":["$","$L66",null,{"id":"fa5c7feb-8db2-4abb-82fb-2ead351d4d97","wordgroups":[{"id":"576c8016-a998-49ce-a413-64f6117d0ee3","body":"وابن","analyses":[{"id":"82273163-b7aa-4dd7-a93b-3e78fd0265cf","lex":null,"root":"بنو","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"bnw","wordgroup_id":"576c8016-a998-49ce-a413-64f6117d0ee3","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"fa5c7feb-8db2-4abb-82fb-2ead351d4d97","order_number":0},{"id":"07afd398-681f-40a5-96ae-4a92c1fd1a76","body":"أبي","analyses":[{"id":"bc809aab-fe27-4bcd-b7fa-43a4362d7d26","lex":null,"root":"أبو","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"abw","wordgroup_id":"07afd398-681f-40a5-96ae-4a92c1fd1a76","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"fa5c7feb-8db2-4abb-82fb-2ead351d4d97","order_number":1},{"id":"6455562b-5096-433e-8f40-a7ae09bb71e0","body":"أبي","analyses":[{"id":"80183d8d-8535-4d60-970a-1938051cc775","lex":null,"root":"أبو","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"abw","wordgroup_id":"6455562b-5096-433e-8f40-a7ae09bb71e0","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"fa5c7feb-8db2-4abb-82fb-2ead351d4d97","order_number":2},{"id":"9bd84154-0021-4520-8211-0a3d36f63102","body":"أبيين","analyses":[{"id":"b8fb87eb-2d9c-4916-934d-67c5fc9cdcf4","lex":null,"root":"أبي","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"aby","wordgroup_id":"9bd84154-0021-4520-8211-0a3d36f63102","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"fa5c7feb-8db2-4abb-82fb-2ead351d4d97","order_number":4}],"analysesMap":{"9bd84154-0021-4520-8211-0a3d36f63102":[{"id":100875,"root":"أبي","root_slug":"aby","surah":2,"verse":34,"word_index":9,"arabic_text":"وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ اسْجُدُوا لِآدَمَ فَسَجَدُوا إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ","translation_text":"When We told the angels, &lsquo;Bow down before Adam,&rsquo; they all bowed.
